p: Recently, Ashraf’s group has studied the substituted benzoic acid and cinnamic acid thymol moieties. They observed that 2-[5-methyl-2-propan-2-yl)phenoxy]-2-oxoethyl-3,4-dihydroxybenzoate 46 has a higher antioxidant potential (IC 50 = 11.30 μM) in comparison to standard ascorbic acid (IC 50 = 24.20 μM) ( Figure 11) [ 41].
